page.title: 16Benlaw Grove(New Estate)
page.content: At the Northern approach to Felton,a new estate of private houses called Benlaw Grove is nearly completed.There are 34 completed houses and one large site waiting to be built on. 7 houses are not yet occupied,one of which is for the Minister of the United Reformed Church in West Thirston. The Vicar of St.Michaels C. of E. Church lives in the first house on the estate.It is a large detached house. Of the 34 completed houses, 4 are detached, 18 are bungalows and 12 are semi-detached Dutch bungalows. To the N.W. of the village,behind the old Police House,there is a site with outline planning permission for 25 more new houses.
